page.title: 04COITY CHURCH REPAIRS
page.content: Last year the Church roof was falling off so the builders started to put on new slates. The church is 600 years old and has been in our village all that time, while the church roof was being put on the church services were held in the church hall. Our church holds a Sunday school for the children in the village. The church roof took 5 months to repair and cost Â£70,000. On Easter Sunday the church was repaired. People are very pleased now that they are back. Church services start at nine thirty in the morning and finish at ten forty-five. Sunday school is after church in the church hall.
